This is probably in a FAQ document somewhere, if so please direct me to it.

How does one test a private method? Is the only recourse to make the method protected or package private, thus "exposing" the method more than desired? 

Thanks,

Scott
:-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
subject: Writing tests for private methods
